text_elements.typography_notes: The brush script style gives a traditional and artistic feel, but may affect readability at smaller sizes.

symbol.description: A stylized fish integrated into the text

color_palette.contrast_notes: The black and orange-red contrast well, ensuring visibility.

layout.balance_notes: The design is well-balanced with the symbol integrated into the text.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate white space around the elements enhances readability.

issues.description: Brush script may reduce readability at smaller sizes.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a more legible font for smaller applications.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns with trends emphasizing cultural heritage and authenticity.
